body.value: <font color="lightgrey">that while the primary procession is taking place, the formal procession is taking place, there are-- there's this band, or rather there are multiple bands of people gathered along the side, who are doing these other things. And each time they do the other thing, it takes a different form. Nobody dances the second line exactly the same way twice. There's certain basic steps, certain basic movements, and you do countless variations on those.</font>
